Description: ear-ring in carnelian and 6 faience beads A: fragment of ear-ring made of carnelian, rounded triangular in section, no further decoration. B: two cylindrical segmented beads, made of faience, white, both broken off C: two disc-shaped beads, the slightly larger is made of light green glazed faience, the smaller one is made of ostrich eggshell D: one elongated sphere bead made of faience, white E: one ring-shaped bead made of faience, faint traces of blue glaze
Acquisition notes: Formerly housed by the Birmingham Museum and Art Gallery and the EES London.
